name: Underwater Mayor Tycoon
description:
Game about  underwater city building. 

Strong underwater theme, as Mayor you run place buildings in your Dome (underwater city). Gameplay arcade, but under easy nd streamline process you can discover decent economic model base on fact that moving to next level cost money but also decrease price for correct placing new buildings. So key strategy on meta level in pick right time to move forward.

Earn. Build. Repeat.
